message.raw:
Bugfixes:

- Renamed exposuretime to exposure_time everywhere in Camera. The keyword
  argument and h5 attribute must have the same name, so one of them had to
  change since this was previously inconsistent. Kept backward compatibility
  for now such that exposuretime can still be passed in as a kwarg and things
  will work.

- Fixed incorrect calls to labscript_utils.properties.get() in NI cards

- Moved clock_terminal to be a connection table property of NI cards, rather
  than a device property

- Fixed incorrect call to self.set_property in PhaseMatrixQuickSyn


Bumped version to 2.0.0

Bumped version requirements to labscript 2.1, blacs 2.1

  • Fixed incorrect calls to labscript_utils.properties.get() in NI cards

  • Moved clock_terminal to be a connection table property of NI cards, rather
    than a device property

  • Fixed incorrect call to self.set_property in PhaseMatrixQuickSyn

Bumped version to 2.0.0

Bumped version requirements to labscript 2.1, blacs 2.1
